name: Keep it Alive (jeremyfa)
description:
Keep it/them Alive!

Click on the ground to put numbered action stamps that will make your fellow walk to the right direction. There are only 8 levels. I wish I had the time to add much more but you know… I hope it still gives a good taste of the concept. The game was created in 48h for Ludum Dare 46 with ceramic engine and the Haxe programming language. Music composed on Korg Gadget.

Thanks for playing!
